name: Dice Dreams (itch)
description:
You are tasked with piloting a die through a tranquil yet challenging puzzle-scape. May the narrorator help you on your journey!

Our submission for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Game Development, 3D Art:  Anton Clark (antonc13)

Audio, Level Design, Web Design, Voice: Nicholas McKee (skele10)
